summary: Defines a set of Django template filters that convert raw numeric and date/time values into human‑readable, natural‑language representations, handling commas, large‑number words, relative dates, time differences, and ordinal forms while respecting the project's internationalisation settings.
business_intent: Simplify the presentation layer by allowing developers to display data in templates in a user‑friendly, localized format without writing custom formatting logic, thereby enhancing readability and user experience across different languages.
